• CSS Centered tab menu – i always had some trouble getting it down.
  • Index your database – the importance of indexing your database tables, and in a right way. (btw, i am working on an enhancement to the rails model generator to add this option automatically for foreign key columns).
  • JQuery 101 slides – some useful stuff for beginners.
  • Freelancer Myths – Some are true actually, at least from the freelancers i know.
